kits.name: Shinami
kits.description: Invisible node infrastructure for seamless blockchain development. Enterprise-grade RPC nodes and APIs.

kits.name: Privy
kits.description: Embedded wallets & user authentication for Move-based apps. Simple onboarding for your users.

kits.name: Yuzu
kits.description: Cross-chain asset bridge and liquidity protocol. Move assets seamlessly across networks.

kits.name: Sentio
kits.description: Powerful blockchain analytics and monitoring platform. Real-time insights for your Move apps.

kits.name: Movement CLI
kits.description: Official command-line interface for Movement Network. Build, test, and deploy Move contracts.

kits.name: Movement TypeScript SDK
kits.description: Type-safe TypeScript SDK for building frontend applications on Movement Network.

kits.name: Oracle Integration
kits.description: Real-world data feeds for your Move smart contracts. Reliable price feeds and external data.

kits.name: Wallet Adapter
kits.description: Universal wallet connection library. Support multiple wallets with a single integration.

kits.name: Move Prover
kits.description: Formal verification tool for Move smart contracts. Ensure your code is mathematically correct.

kits.name: Movement Indexer
kits.description: Fast blockchain data indexer. Query historical data and events with ease.

kits.name: NFT Toolkit
kits.description: Complete toolkit for creating and managing NFTs on Movement. Minting, metadata, and marketplaces.

kits.name: DeFi Protocol SDK
kits.description: Build decentralized finance applications with pre-built modules for lending, swapping, and staking.
